title: SpectralCNN
content: Novel CNN on spectral features for empirical analysis of GTZAN music genre classification versus natural CNNs, in a team of 2 members.

title: Foliage
content: Cryptocurrency wallet and tracker mobile app for deployment to Android and iOS devices.

title: Project URefer
content: Job referral portal designed and engineered by a team of 11 members using Scrum methodology.

title: Cough Detector
content: Cough detection web app through audio recordings based on custom learned model.

title: HackUMass Website
content: HackUMass IX landing website with new functionalities and UI improvements, maintained alongside 10+ tech members.

title: Perpetual Crusades
content: Two-player online dice-based board game with a theme loosely set around Dungeons & Dragons.
